findings.issue: Website positioned as DevOps & Platform Engineering Products company, completely misaligned with AutomateForge.io automation services brand

findings.issue: Title, meta description, OG tags all reference 'DevOps & Platform Engineering Products' and 'KSeF integrations'
findings.fix: Rewrote all meta tags targeting 'business automation services', 'workflow automation consultant', 'n8n expert', 'Make.com developer', 'custom API integration'

findings.issue: Google Analytics GA4 script loaded unconditionally in index.html before user cookie consent
findings.fix: Removed auto-loading GA from index.html. GA now only loads after explicit user consent via CookieConsent component

findings.issue: Polish market content on .io domain directly overlaps with AutomateForge.pl brand
findings.fix: Removed PL pages from sitemap, removed language switcher from nav, English-only positioning for .io domain

findings.issue: No Schema.org structured data markup at all

findings.issue: Sitemap had incorrect URLs (/en/agents instead of /en/ai-agents, /pl/products instead of /pl/uslugi)
findings.fix: Rewrote sitemap with correct English-only URLs reflecting new route structure

findings.issue: No canonical URL defined in HTML head
Contact form uses mailto: link — unreliable, requires user's email client to be configured
findings.fix: Kept mailto approach (no backend available) but improved UX with service dropdown, better placeholder text, and clear fallback messaging. Backend integration recommended as roadmap item.

findings.issue: No target keywords in meta tags
findings.fix: Added meta keywords: 'business automation services, workflow automation consultant, n8n expert, Make.com developer, custom API integration, AI integration services, process optimization, Zapier automation'

findings.issue: og.png referenced in OG meta tags but missing from /public
findings.fix: Not fixed — requires design asset creation

findings.issue: Google Fonts loaded from CDN in CSS @import (render blocking)
findings.fix: Acceptable for current scale. Font subsetting recommended in roadmap.
